name: Cajun Spice Recipe - How to make Cajun Seasoning Blend
description: Cajun Spice Recipe. Make your own Cajun seasoning. How to make Cajun spice. Vegan Gluten-free RecipeMakes about 2.5 tbsp blend
recipeIngredient: 2 tbsp paprika (, sweet + smoked, use more of one or the other based on heat preference. Smoky paprika is generally hotter. )
optional add ins for variation: (crushed bay leaf, 1/4 tsp ground mustard)

recipeInstructions.text: Mix all the ingredients and store in an airtight container for upto 3 months
recipeInstructions.name: Mix all the ingredients and store in an airtight container for upto 3 months
